house_listing.house_description: Gracious 2nd floor unit, beautifully maintained, updated kitchen, large family room, ornamental fireplace in living room, nice street garage, monthly fee includes heat, hot water, taxes, lawn care & trash removal. W&d owned by association.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Garage Door Opener, Utility Room
